sourcesContent:
<input placeholder="some value" [(ngModel)]="text" />
<app-img *ngIf="showImage" (loaded)="onLoaded($event)" [img]="text"></app-img>

<button (click)="toogleImage()">Toogle Image</button>
<app-product [product]="product" *ngFor="let product of products"></app-product>
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { IProduct } from '../models/product.model';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-root',
  templateUrl: './app.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'],
})
export class AppComponent implements OnInit {
  showImage = true;
  title = 'store';
  text =
    'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/Angular_full_color_logo.svg/1200px-Angular_full_color_logo.svg.png';

  products: IProduct[] = [
    {
      id: '1',
      name: 'Laptop',
      image:
        'https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0101/2522/products/LD0005959734_d11abfc9-3919-4245-a1dc-cc283615c6d3_1600x.jpg?v=1657154270',
      price: 100,
    },
    {
      id: '2',
      name: 'Iphone',
      image:
        'https://www.apple.com/newsroom/images/product/iphone/geo/Apple-iPhone-14-iPhone-14-Plus-hero-220907-geo_Full-Bleed-Image.jpg.large.jpg',
      price: 100,
    },
    {
      id: '3',
      name: 'Phone',
      image:
        'https://www.max.com.gt/media/catalog/product/cache/40cff66e483d5074b1ae49efef994171/m/o/motog22b.png',
      price: 100,
    },
    {
      id: '4',
      name: 'Mouse',
      image:
        'https://www.officedepot.com.gt/medias/35045.jpg-1200ftw?context=bWFzdGVyfHJvb3R8MTgyOTM3fGltYWdlL2pwZWd8aDlhL2hkNi85OTEwOTY2MTkwMTEwLmpwZ3w0YzQzOTdkY2U4Zjc1ZDI0NzkwZjU3ZTM1YjdlOGU3Mjk1YTI1YWU2MjA1OWNlODdiZmM5N2E1ZDkwYTMyZjNl',
      price: 100,
    },
  ];

  constructor() {}

  ngOnInit(): void {}

  onLoaded(img: string) {
    console.log(img);
    console.log('event sent child to parent');
  }

  toogleImage() {
    this.showImage = false;
  }
}
